column4: hi all, im having issues making my new graphics card work under x using the nvidia drivers...
what seems to be the problem ?
it doesnt seems like the nvidia drivers are loaded because i dont get the splashscreen, and also the resolution is 640x480 although my config states 1280x1024...
and you used the guide from ubuntuguide ?
it seems like the card isnt recognized correctly... the other one was recognized perfectly but it one just says "unknown nvidia card"
http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Dapper#How_to_install_Graphics_Driver_.28NVIDIA.29
ive been looking around for info, which guide are you refering to?
2 gfx cards ?
i posted the link before: http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Dapper#How_to_install_Graphics_Driver_.28NVIDIA.29
no only one, i had a geforce 4 mx 420, i upgraded to a dual display geforce 6200, but i still only have one monitor and im not configuring anything for dual yet
ok, twin view is what its called when nvidia
but you have put in another card now without new drivers correct ?
yeah but I dont want any of that.. yet. do i still need to set it up even if its for only one monitor?
not twin view no.
thats only for 2 monitors
i simply replaced my old nvidia apg for a new one
and now it wont find it ?
thats correct
ok. one moment
might read this http://doc.gwos.org/index.php/Latest_Nvidia_Dapper
thanks im looking it up
tell me thanks if it works
